Reviews.Author: TealBean7
Reviews.Content: Just got my table yesterday and I haven't put it down. I just got rid of my Ipad2 and decided to purchase the nook because I wanted something smaller. I did a lot of research on different kinds of tablets and finally decided on the nook hd. I love that it has a space for my micro sd card. It is perfect and I am confident that I made the right decision.
Reviews.Title: It's Awesome

Reviews.Author: Joan Brown
Reviews.Content: This was an early mothers day gift. Love it. Simple to use. Screen very easy on the eyes. So easy to see. Thanks to the best daughter ever.
Reviews.Title: Love it.

Reviews.Author: Jenny Fenwick
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughter. I thought it said it was a 9 inch screen but it's 7 instead but it's still a great size. Has everything she wanted.
Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Author: Calvin Raines
Reviews.Content: Was exactly as describe by seller & my wife absolutely loves it, only thing I worry about is the darn thing gets more attention then me. Haha. Seriously it is in great shape runs perfectly.
Reviews.Title: Great Buy

Reviews.Author: legendarylady "legendarylady"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my parents and they loved it. She was wanting a tablet but this product gave her everything she would want a tablet for. I own a 7 inch but will soon buy a 9 inch for myself.
Reviews.Title: Great service and fast shipping.

Reviews.Author: TIMOTHY SMITH
Reviews.Content: Bought as a Christmas gift and it was well received!!  She can't put it down, great choice and great deal!!!
Reviews.Title: Amazing, she loves it!!!

Reviews.Author: LaDawn Moore
Reviews.Content: I had the first Nook Color years ago, and found it hard to navigate. I didn't keep it. I gave this Nook HD a try, and so far I've been much happier. It's user friendly,fits nicely in my palm, and easy to shop on and download. I'd recommend it to anyone who want to read with an e-reader, from young to old. It's a great product.
Reviews.Title: Improved!

Reviews.Author: Cara Brown
Reviews.Content: Had difficulty downloading a book.  Could not get mine craft on it which was the reason I bought it for my daughter
Reviews.Title: no Minecraft

Reviews.Author: Barb L. Meberg "dakota55"
Reviews.Content: am very pleased with the tablet was a big upgrade from the color. Is a lot easier to turn pages and have something to do quick searches on the internet.
Reviews.Title: nook tablet
